1052680.name: Fantasy Grounds - Supers, Volume 6 (Token Pack)
1052680.description:
Supers, Volume 6

Got a little something your players need to avenge? Perhaps you need to form a league of justice to battle the forces of darkness in your city? Well, wait no more with Monster Grin's 132 unique tokens of supers, superheroes, super-heroines, and super-villains, each usable as PCs, NPCs, mooks, antagonists, or protagonists! Stunning, more-than-four-color pieces can become mythological heroes from the Dark Ages of Briton, mysteriously dark spider-themed heroes or villains, or the mighty golden king of all supers, and much more!
Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, black, silver, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of what's what and who's who and bring your game up to date! Also, with Monster Grin's new Altered States tokens, you can get maximum value from each and every token in this pack and really add that special something to your game!
This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, and silver, as well as ethereal, invisible, stone-skinned, sand-skinned, and altered state versions):
  • Golden Lion, the Gilded King of the Supers
  • Jupiter, Mythological Greek Heroine
  • Lord Darc, Super Villain from the Middle Ages
  • Pendragon, Briton's Defender from the Age of Legend
  • Recluse, Dark Spider-themed Anti-Hero
  • Typhon, the Massive Menace from the Cosmic Beyond
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
